title: Bonus 14: What a Revelation! The Apocalypse of St John the Divine
itunes:title: Bonus: What a Revelation! The Apocalypse of St John the Divine
description: In this co-released episode, Steve Guerra of the History of the Papacy podcast and I continue our series on the apocalyptic literature, with the first of two episodes on the earliest Christian apocalypse, the Book of Revelation. It barely made it into the New Testament.
content:encoded: In this co-released episode, Steve Guerra of the History of the Papacy podcast and I continue our series on the apocalyptic literature, with the first of two episodes on the earliest Christian apocalypse, the Book of Revelation. It barely made it into the New Testament.
itunes:subtitle: The first Christian apocalypse
itunes:author: Garry Stevens, Stephen Guerra
